attributes.title: Horrible App
attributes.review: This app took forever for me to download and when it was in the process of downloading, my phone continued to glitch and I was unable to do anything on my phone. Then once the app was downloaded, my whole phone was running significantly slower. I think there is something seriously wrong with the app since I have noticed others having the same problem I am.
